name: Greedy Hands
desc: Photoshopped hands in suits grabbing at the Earth... because they're greedy, awful, hands.

name: "Silence" Film Poster
desc: Movie poster for a student-led short film. The photograph was taken by a different photographer, but I did the compositing and editing.

name: "I See Dead People" Film Poster
desc: Movie poster for a student-led comedy film. Both the photography and editing were done by myself.

name: USA Forever Postage Stamp
desc: Part of a series of fictional stamps commemorating 100 years of the American automobile. Created by compositing miniature models into photographed environments.
